entities.name: Harry
entities.description: The main character of the story

entities.name: Voldemort
entities.description: The antagonist and a powerful wizard

entities.name: Dark Mark
entities.description: A symbol or mark that is associated with Voldemort

relationships.description: The Dark Mark has a connection to both Harry and Voldemort, as it causes Harry's scar to react when touched.
The Dark Mark is connected to Harry through his scar.
The Dark Mark is associated with Voldemort, as it causes him to feel a summons when touched.
